elements.text: There is a particular way you've always done laundry, making sure to separate colors. When you take a load out of the dryer, you notice several articles have been stained and feel frustrated that your attention seems to be...

elements.name: Stained Laundry_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
